name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: I love this purse. It is very stylish and adds a beautiful little pop of color to your outfit! There is a detachable shoulder strap, so you can either hang it on your shoulder or use it as a hand bag.  The material is thick and does not appear cheap at all. There is a small zip pocket on the outside, a zip compartment in the middle on the inside, two open compartments, a small zip pocket on the inside wall on one side, and two sewn pockets on the opposite inside wall. It is nicely designed and has ample space to hold and neatly organize all of your items. Great price point for the high quality bag you receive. Would definitely recommend.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 29 August 2023

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: Love this purse! Ordered another for my mom and will probably order yet another for myself. Was a little shook by how super pretty and high end these purses look in person. Seem well made and sturdy, both inside and outside. The hardware is shiny without looking obnoxiously fake. The inside is spacious, imo. Three zipped compartments, two main open compartments, and then two small open compartments. The included keychain was super cute. For this price, just buy it!
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 25 September 2023

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: Very nice high end looking handbag.I was set back at the size but to my surprise after loading it with my stuff which wasWallet, makeup bag, keys, sunglasses, mints, small tube hand lotion, small hand sanitizer, cell phone. The pockets inside are very useful as is the zipper pocket on the outside.I like can use as a shoulder or hand.Con: packing should have been in a cardboard box not a paper envelope.Purse was crimped but I stuffed with paper overnight all is good.Very nice attractive purse for the price.

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: It’s been few days I have used this handbag and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The bag is not only stylish but also very functional. The quality of the material used is excellent and it feels durable. The size is perfect, allowing me to carry all my essentials without feeling bulky. The interior compartments are well-designed, making it easy to organize my belongings. The bag also comes with a detachable strap, giving me the option to wear it as a crossbody or carry it as a handbag. Overall, I recommend this handbag for its style, functionality, quality and most importantly with this price range.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 March 2024

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: I love this purse!  It is the perfect size.  Not big like a tote, or small like a clutch.  It can fit a full size iPad (horizontal), my wallet, lotion, work badge, Covid vaccination registry card, a box of mints, pens, and a pill case.  And even a bit more as even that doesn’t make the purse bulge with too much stuff.  My only concern is that I’m not familiar with the brand.  I don’t know how long it will last, if the lettering for the brand name will start to rub off (which would look super tacky), or the handles will start to show wear and tear.  If any of that happens in the next couple months, I’ll report back.  But for now, I am super happy and in love with this purse!11/18/23 - well the handles didn't  hold up very well.  There is a black string or black plastic  that runs along the handle which came disconnected and weirdly, was longer than what would fit back in the spot - like it had stretched or something - and the only thing I could do was cut it off.  See 2nd pic.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2024

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
I recently purchased the Alarion purse in a lovely dusty mauve color, and I must say, it has some great features. The front and back pockets with button closures are convenient for quick access, and the main compartment, secured with a zipper, offers both open pockets and a zippered interior pocket, which is perfect for staying organized.However, it's worth noting that the purse is a bit smaller than I expected. Additionally, the interior material feels somewhat thin. Nevertheless, despite these minor drawbacks, the purse is undeniably beautiful, and I'm excited to start using it for various occasions.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2024

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
reviews: I like the design and the color. Considering the low price it looks a lot more expensive than that.However, it is smaller than it looks and smaller than the measurements in the description. The outside bottom area, which is the longest is not even 11" inches. Inside it is 10" inches long and 9 1/2" in the middle section. Width in the outside area of the handbag is about 4 1/2" inches in the widest area, so inside it's narrower and it is hard to fit several things comfortably. I hope it lasts. But I like the look and will be keeping it.I read someone saying that the short handles cannot bend to the sides, but mine can. Also, the longer strap can be adjusted and yes, you can use it as a cross bag. It is long enough to do that comfortably.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2023

name: ALARION Womens Purses and Handbags Shoulder Bag Ladies Designer Satchel Messenger Tote Bag
